Class BulgarianSolitaire

  • java.lang.Object
    • BulgarianSolitaire
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BulgarianSolitaire.CardSplitter

    public class BulgarianSolitaire
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a model of the Bulgarian Solitaire game

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  BulgarianSolitaire.CardSplitter
      Represents a CardSplitter who sets up the game.

      • numberOfPiles

        private static int numberOfPiles()
        Returns the number current number of piles
        Returns:
        number of piles

      • cardsInPile

        private static int cardsInPile(int column)

      • checkForUniqueNumbers

        private void checkForUniqueNumbers()
        Checks for unique numbers up to a specific boundary (FINAL_PILE_COUNT). If one is found the method puts it into the uniqueNumbers array. This exists to prevent the game from picking up and putting down cards infinitely.

      • validPileCount

        private boolean validPileCount()
        Checks to see if the current number of piles equals the FINAL_PILE_COUNT
        Returns:
        condition of final pile count

      • allUniqueNumbersFound

        private boolean allUniqueNumbersFound()
        Checks to see if numbers 1 through FINAL_PILE_COUNT exist in a pile
        Returns:
        condition that piles are made up of all unique numbers

      • gameNotOver

        private boolean gameNotOver()
        Calls allConditionsMet() to see if game is over. If game is not over, shiftCards() method is called to advance the game
        Returns:
        required conditions not met

      • allConditionsMet

        private boolean allConditionsMet()
        Checks to see if conditions required for the game to be over are met.
        Returns:
        all conditions are met

      • uniqueNumberFound

        private static boolean uniqueNumberFound(int num)
        Checks to see if a particular number exists in the unique number array
        Parameters:
        num - number to check
        Returns:
        not in the unique number array

      • isExclusiveUniqueNumber

        private boolean isExclusiveUniqueNumber(int num)
        Checks to see if a number is the only one that exists in all piles. Only applies to numbers under or equal to the FINAL_PILE_COUNT.
        Parameters:
        num - number to check
        Returns:
        number is exclusive

      • uniqueNumberInList

        private boolean uniqueNumberInList(int num)
        Checks to see if a number exists in the uniqueNumbers array.
        Parameters:
        num - number being checked
        Returns:
        existence of number

        private void output(java.lang.String text)

        Parameters:
        text - string of text to print

      • printPiles

        private void printPiles()
        Calls output() method to print the current number of cards in each pile.
